CREATE TABLE temp_submissions AS SELECT * FROM submissions
CREATE TABLE temp_submission_categories AS SELECT * FROM submission_categories

UPDATE submissions SET status=1 FROM submissions AS s LEFT JOIN published_submissions ps ON (ps.submission_id = s.submission_id) WHERE s.submission_id = submissions.submission_id AND s.status=3 AND ps.submission_id IS NULL
